RegenVest (Mienshao).description: The alternative EV spread sacrifices some bulk to allow Alolan Muk to threaten special attackers that can recover more effectively, most notably Magic Guard Primarina.

Magic Guard (Clefairy).description: 152 Speed EVs without a boosting nature allows it to outspeed max Speed Adamant Great Tusk

Fur Coat (Persian A).description: 152 Speed EVs allows it to outspeed max Speed Jolly Great Tusk

Mixed Contrary (Inkay).description: 52 Speed EVs lets it outrun Barraskewda, and 208 Special Attack EVs guarantee that Psychic OHKOes max HP Great Tusk

Levitate (Chimecho / Latios / Latias).description: Keep in mind that due to how Inheritance works, when using this set any combination of moves you wish to run must be legal on either Chimecho, Latios, or Latias.

Spikes + Spin (Bramblin).description: 100 Speed EVs allows it to outspeed uninvested Gliscor

Fur Coat + SubPlot (Persian-Alola).description: Maximum HP investment combined with 4 Defence EVs prevents Knock Off from Assault Vest Snorlax from ever breaking a Substitute. 100 Speed EVs allows it to outspeed uninvested Gliscor

Fire Lash DD (Salazzle).description: 152 Speed EVs lets it outrun Darkrai at +1
